name: Project Cairn
description:
Play in Fullscreen!

If the game isn't working, try playing it on a different web browser. Make sure to enable cookies if you want your game to save.

PC/Mac Controls:
Right click + drag to move camera
Left click + drag to move blocks; release to lightly toss them in the direction away from the camera

Mobile Controls:
Two fingers tap + drag to move camera
One finger tap + drag to move blocks; release to lightly toss them in the direction away from the camera
